items.sentence: Maybe I should stay in Boston for another week or so.

Tom knew that he needed to do something to help Mary.
Mary started digging into her purse to find her keys.
Mary was deeply affected by the death of her husband.
Tom didn\'t have his parents\' permission to do that.
Did you hear about what happened in Boston yesterday?
Did you hear about what happened to Tom this morning?
Did you really think that I was the one who did that?
Well, in this country you\'re not allowed to do that.
I finally understand what you were trying to tell me.
Tom couldn\'t figure out what Mary was trying to say.
Tom couldn\'t find what he wanted at the supermarket.
Tom couldn\'t fit into the pants he wore last summer.
Tom couldn\'t have passed that test without cheating.
Tom must\'ve been very young when he wrote this song.

Tom couldn\'t tell whether Mary dyed her hair or not.

If you can\'t say anything nice, don\'t say anything.
